inclusion.criterion: approximately 1-2 weeks prior to her expected date of follow up
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: conversation and invited to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: interviewed by the clinical research nurse using the format of the prepared proforma (Form A)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: symptoms suggestive of disease recurrence as well as treatment induced toxicity
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: worrisome symptoms of disease or not and has symptoms of treatment toxicity or not for which she should visit the hospital
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: complete history and in addition, performs a physical examination and any investigations he/she deems necessary
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: final impression of disease status and toxicity which are taken as the gold standard (Form B)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: information regarding the acceptability of nurse-led telephonic follow-up to the patient and the financial impact of physical follow- up will be collected using a structured format (Form C)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with Stage III disease treated with palliative intent with once monthly radiotherapy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Early stage cervical cancer patients who underwent Wertheims hysterectomy and who have completed adjuvant radiochemotherapy due to high-risk factors
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has been experiencing persistent feelings of sadness, loss of interest in activities, depressed mood for the past 3 weeks, weight loss, loss of energy, and feelings of worthlessness. She is menopausal and her husband was recently diagnosed with colon cancer.
